alert.note: Alert for Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 01 at 2:16AM CST until January 01 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN WEAKLEY AND NORTHERN HENRY COUNTIES... At 215 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm producing a tornado was located 10 miles north of Paris, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Paris Landing State Park, Cottage Grove, Puryear, Mill Creek, Osage, Whitlock, Jones Mill, Foundry Hill, Conyersville, Pine Hill, Crossland and Buchanan. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
